comment: Pull a scalar multiplication out of a sum of vectors. This theorem properly generalizes ~ gsummulc2 , since every ring is a left module over itself. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 10-Jul-2019.)
